videos.description: Zeke Nnaji rocks the rim on a thunderous throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zeke Nnaji shows no mercy on the rim with vicious throwdown) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zeke Nnaji shows no mercy on the rim with vicious throwdown

videos.description: Nuggets don't have an answer for the Timberwolves beyond the arc as the team knocks down nine 3-pointers.
